name: Deadly Snowball
description:
Deadly Snowball is a single player casual game. It's mechanics is to destroy all the snowballs before it reaches the player by tapping it. Every snowballs have different colors and each color have the corresponding number of taps before it will be destroyed. Complete all levels and recieve a corresponding reward!

Game Developer:

-Jeric Rey Echavez (Graphic Programmer and Level Designer)

-Cossette Alexis Gabuya (Programmer)

-Efren Laid (Artist, 3D Modeller)

-Neil Allen Bahan (Front-end Artist, Texture Artist)
